attributes.action: Make more driving tests available and extend the theory test Expiry
attributes.additional_details: Costing people money on excessive lessons untill a practical test becomes available and extend the theory tests as only holds for 2 years
attributes.background: Make more driving tests available and extend the expiry of theory tests due to not being able to book the practical in time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Fund the DVSA to increase the availability of practical driving tests
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705408

Extend the theory test expiry date from the current 2 years to 3 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700314
